function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Closeness to urban nature impacting physical activity among vulnerable groups.","Impact":"Reduced physical activity and well-being among children, the elderly, and persons with reduced mobility.","Mitigation":"Ensure access to small green spaces within the city for all social groups, not just the general population.","Technologies":"Community planning, urban design, and green space development.","People":"Children, the elderly, persons with reduced mobility.","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, community organizations."},{"Description":"Increased pedestrian and cycling activities on city trails with >75% tree canopy cover.","Impact":"Overcrowding and lack of social distancing on trails with high tree canopy cover.","Mitigation":"Manage trail usage and access to prevent overcrowding, promote social distancing measures, and provide alternative recreational areas.","Technologies":"Trail management systems, crowd monitoring technology, communication tools for promoting social distancing.","People":"Recreationists, general public.","Owner":"Local government, park authorities, trail management organizations."}]}
